description: Leah Jaye is a college student who tries to convince her professor, Mark Davis to change her grade on a term paper. She is a defiant little brat and is used to getting her way by being flirtatious. Mark gives her the option to earn the grade if she plays by his rules. Leah is horny enough to be tied up, punished, suck cock and get fucked in the ass by her teacher.
title: Good Little Cock Sucker
